thread.title: Authorities: Off-duty NYPD officer slashed in Queens park
thread.title_full: Authorities: Off-duty NYPD officer slashed in Queens park - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Authorities: Off-duty NYPD officer slashed in Queens park
text:
NEW YORK (AP) - Authorities say an off-duty New York City police officer suffered minor injuries after being slashed during a robbery at a Queens park.
It happened Friday afternoon as the officer walked her dog in Cunningham Park in Fresh Meadows.
New York Police Department Deputy Commissioner Stephen Davis told reporters the officer was near a bathroom when she was approached from behind by a suspect who tried to grab her purse.
Davis says the officer, whose name was not immediately released, was cut on the right side of her neck. Her injuries were considered minor.
Officers recovered a pair of scissors nearby, but haven't linked them to the slashing.
A suspect was being questioned Friday night. No charges have been filed.
